system.description:
You have fully embraced your role and awesome power is yours. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your choice of your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • When you reduce a hostile creature to 0 hit points with a spell that deals radiant or necrotic damage, you regain an artifact charge.
  • You gain an additional benefit based on your Bonded Artifact type:
    • If your Bonded Artifact is a weapon of power, it counts as being adamantine and so does any other weapon you wield while it is in your possession.
    • If your Bonded Artifact is an armor of power, choose radiant or necrotic damage when you take this feat. You are immune to the selected damage type when you are wearing your Bonded Artifact.
    • If your Bonded Artifact is a font of power, choose a 6th-level spell from the cleric list. You can cast the spell once per long rest without using a spell slot.
  • Your Wielder levels count as Cleric levels for the purpose of determining access to and the effects of the Providence feature.
